item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

3/14/2011 location - Anna Liffeys'

Anna Liffey's is a charming old Irish Pub in Downtown New Haven.  With St. Patty's day comming up, it's a good way to get into the spirit of things.  And if you're not one much for the Irish, I'm sure you can find some good pub food and friends here anyways. Located on Whitney Avenue, just after it changes over from Church Street, with a big old Irish Flag out front.  Don't be decieved if you don't see anyone in the window, a lot of the time the Fun is in the downstairs bar.

If you wish, you could look at thier website... (linked).

Your contact/host is Me (AJ), and you attempt to reach him at 315-345-9348, call or Text is fine.  I recommend Texting though as Cell phone reception inside Anna Liffey's is often elusive.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: We're probably one of if not the largest groups of people at the bar on a Monday. You can also Call/look for the "Contact/host" (AJ in this case), cell phone number listed below.
item.why: 'tis the season to get Irish if you aren't already.
item.name: Happy Hour - Anna Liffeys'
